# SDK Docs

> Documentation for SDK Docs.

- [Artifacts output layout](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/sdk/artifacts-output.md): Learn about a .NET SDK feature that centralizes and simplifies the layout of project outputs.
- [File-based apps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/sdk/file-based-apps.md): Learn how to create, build, and run C# applications from a single file without a project file.
